channel.title: Clickjacking on wroot
channel.description: Recent content in Clickjacking on wroot

item.title: Playing around with Samyâ€™s Quickjack clickjacker
item.description: In the past few days I’ve started following the work of Samy Kankar, which has some great work. Among all of them, I’ve almost-randomly picked one to play, Quickjack. From Samy’s project page: Quickjack is a tool developed to easily create pages with the capability to clickjack users no matter where they click on the page. The tool has an extremely intuitive interface and is literally a point-and-click tool.
